hints: You cannot do anything about colsum[i] = 2 case or colsum[i] = 0 case. Then you put colsum[i] = 1 case to the upper row until upper has reached. Then put the rest into lower row.
Fill 0 and 2 first, then fill 1 in the upper row or lower row in turn but be careful about exhausting permitted 1s in each row.
